A1.title: Answer-first design
A1.tooltip: Put the answer at the top with jump links and a scannable list/table.
A1.description: A concise answer in the first ~600–800 chars, jump links/ToC, a scannable list/table near the top.
A1.howToWin: Add a 2–4 sentence answer at the top. Include a 'Jump to' ToC with in-page anchors. Use a step list or table if procedural/comparative.

A2.title: Topical cluster integrity
A2.tooltip: Belongs to a tight cluster with pillar links and breadcrumb.
A2.description: Page links to/from a pillar; breadcrumb present; cluster-internal links use descriptive anchors.
A2.howToWin: Create a pillar ('/topic/') and 6–15 focused subpages; interlink them; add breadcrumbs.

A3.title: Host / site-level authority
A3.tooltip: Clear Organization & Author identity with valid schema.
A3.description: Valid Organization + Person JSON-LD, About/Contact, author pages.
A3.howToWin: Add Organization schema site-wide; author bios with credentials; visible editorial standards.

A4.title: Originality & effort
A4.description: Unique assets: data tables, tools, diagrams, code; references/method notes.
A4.howToWin: Publish a downloadable asset (CSV/JSON, calculator, diagram) and explain your method.

A5.title: Schema accuracy & breadth
A5.tooltip: Correct JSON-LD for the page intent; no errors.
A5.description: Valid JSON-LD types (Article, HowTo, FAQPage, QAPage, Product, BreadcrumbList)—no errors.
A5.howToWin: Use server-rendered JSON-LD; minimum viable properties per type; validate.

A6.title: Crawlability & canonicals
A6.description: Self-canonical; unique title/H1; not noindex; no duplicate canonicals in cluster.
A6.howToWin: One canonical per URL; dedupe similar pages; stable titles/H1s.

A7.title: UX & performance proxies
A7.description: No big CLS above the fold; images have width/height; proper viewport; lazy-load below fold.
A7.howToWin: Reserve image space; avoid layout shifts near the answer block.

A8.title: Sitemaps & discoverability
A8.description: /sitemap.xml exists; fresh lastmod; child sitemaps valid.
A8.howToWin: Generate per-section sitemaps; keep lastmod accurate.

A9.title: Freshness & stability
A9.tooltip: Shows updates; links work; URLs stay put.
A9.description: dateModified present and increasing; internal links not 404; URL stable.
A9.howToWin: Update cadence by topic; keep URLs stable; maintain link health.

A10.title: AI Overviews readiness
A10.tooltip: Complete, safe, and well-cited answer for AIO.
A10.description: Clear task framing, steps/pros-cons/safety notes, at least one credible external citation.

G1.title: Citable 'Key Facts' block
G1.description: 'Key facts / At-a-glance' near top; 3–7 atomic bullets; optional anchors per fact.
G1.howToWin: Add a facts box with stable IDs (#fact-eligibility-2025).

G2.title: Provenance schema
G2.tooltip: Author, publisher, dates + citation/isBasedOn/license in JSON-LD.
G2.description: Article/CreativeWork with author, publisher, datePublished, dateModified, citation, isBasedOn, license.
G2.howToWin: Include sources in JSON-LD, not just on page.

G3.title: Evidence density
G3.description: References section; outbound links to high-trust domains; tables/footnotes present.
G3.howToWin: Add References with primary sources and in-page tables (not images).

G4.title: AI crawler access & parity
G4.tooltip: Bots allowed/denied intentionally; content matches rendered.
G4.description: robots policy for GPTBot/Claude-Web/Perplexity; HTML ≈ rendered DOM for key blocks.
G4.howToWin: Set your desired allow/deny; ensure server HTML contains key content/schema.

G5.title: Chunkability & structure
G5.description: Short paragraphs; semantic headings; glossary; TL;DR summary.
G5.howToWin: Add TL;DR, Glossary, and keep sections small and well-labeled.

G6.title: Canonical fact URLs
G6.description: One URL per fact topic; stable anchor names.
G6.howToWin: Split omnibus pages; add stable anchors for linkable facts.

G7.title: Dataset availability
G7.howToWin: Host a /datasets/ file per table; link it from the page.

G8.title: Policy transparency
G8.tooltip: Clear license/AI policy shown & in schema.
G8.description: Visible content license/AI reuse stance in UI + JSON-LD license.
G8.howToWin: Add a site-wide policy page and link it; include license in schema.

G9.title: Update hygiene
G9.description: Visible changelog/'What changed' and dateModified aligned.
G9.howToWin: Add a small changelog block or <details> with edits and dates.

G10.title: Cluster ↔ evidence linking
G10.tooltip: Pillars link to a sources hub and back.
G10.description: Pillars link to a /sources hub; hub links back.
G10.howToWin: Build a central Sources/Research page; link both ways.
